name: hbimg
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: mp2an(wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w2, w3))), wal(s0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w0))), wi(w1, wal(s0, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wal(s0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w3))
-| wi(wa(wal(s0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w0))), wi(w1, wal(s0, w3))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w2, w3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wal(s0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w3))
-| wi(wa(wal(s0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w0))), wi(w1, wal(s0, w3))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w2, w3))))

body.origin:
|- wal(s0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w3))
-| wi(wa(wal(s0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w0))), wi(w1, wal(s0, w3))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w2, w3))))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w0))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wal(s0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w0))), wi(w1, wal(s0, w3))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w2, w3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w3))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w0))

comment: A more general form of ~ hbim . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Dec-2010.)
